Factsheet

Developer:
Knucklebones Interactive
Based in MA, the United States
Release date:
Platforms:
Wheel Steal on Itch.io
Website:
Regular Price:

Description

Wheal Steal is a round-based spelling game that encourages friendly competition, team-based cooperation, and something we called a pleasantly chaotic atmosphere. With so many areas to explore, so many crazy abilities to try out, and so many other kids to play with, children won’t even realize they’re building crucial language art skills.

History

Vertical Slice, August 6

Our vertical slice was finished with intended experience and one polished level

Prototype, March 29

Our playable prototype was finished with core functionalities

Project Launched, Jan 27

Features

  • Realtime Multiplayer
  • Team-based Competition
  • Interactive Environment
